metadata.title: Stanley Home Products Stainless Steel Kitchen Scouring Cleaners (6 Cleaners Included)
features: AMAZING SHINE: It doesn’t matter how delicate your dish is or how tough the spot is on your pot or pan. As tough as steel wool, you can grab one of these handy Stanley Stainless Steel Scrubbers for the job to make your task a breeze.

IMPRESSIVE DURABILITY: Lasting you for months on end, these scrubbers are 100% rust-resistant. In fact, they won’t even rust if they are left in a pool of water all day! You can also safely toss them in the dishwasher for a good rinsing.

TOUGH ON DIRT: Easily scrub away grease, grimy build-up and baked on foods from stainless steel pots and pans, ovens, grill racks and sinks. These scrubbers effortlessly tackle your toughest jobs, effectively cleaning cookware without ruining the finish.

MAKES DISHWASHING ENJOYABLE: Fuller Brush Scrubbers are so gentle on hands that you will just love washing your dishes. Unlike other metal scrubbers and steel wool sponges, they won’t splinter, poke or scratch your skin.

MULTI-USE SCRUBBER: Make use of these scrubbers any place where cleaning is needed. In addition to using them in the kitchen, you can use them in the garage for cleaning tools, motor parts, yard equipment and more – making everything they touch shine.
description: Trusted Brand Since 1931.These high-quality Stainless Steel Scrubbers from Stanley Home Products are made from over 8,000 inches of coiled stainless steel. Each sponge features over 600 feet of 100% stainless steel – that's over 8,000 inches of continuous stainless steel coiled 40,000 times for increased flexibility and extra scrubbing power. Best of all, they can handle tough jobs yet are delicate on your cookware so you don’t need to worry about a scratch.Versatile Use.Stanley Stainless Steel Scrubbers do amazing work on all your kitchen utensils – stainless steel pots, pans, grill racks, ovens and sinks. They also have awesome power on more difficult items to clean, including tools, motor parts, barbecue equipment, outdoor furniture, heavy yard equipment and anywhere you need strong scrubbing power. This scrubbing power is like nothing you've ever seen before until you get ready for your next tough job with one of them in your hand. Skin-Friendly.You would think that something that is so touch on heavy grime would be rough on your hands, but that’s not the case. These scrubbers are so gentle on hands that you can scrub away without worrying about spoiling even sensitive skin hands. They won’t splinter, poke or scratch your skin like other metal scrubbers and steel wool sponges. They’re so gentle, that washing your dishes will no longer be a dreaded chore. Impressive Durability.Do you have real tough spot on your pots that you need to get rid of? Easily outlasting steel wool and other scrubbers, this scrubber scrubs away greasy, grimy build-up and baked-on stains with ease. Tackle your toughest jobs with over 600 feet of stainless steel in the palm of your hand.Easy to Clean.Not only do the Stanley Scrubbers make cleaning easy, but they’re also easy to clean. You can rinse the gently spread coils and run them under warm water or toss them in the dishwasher

title: Stanley Home Products Stainless Steel Scouring Scrubbers
